3 Compound Documents and OLE Controls in DUIM

3.5 Building an OLE control in DUIM

This section gives an overview of building OLE controls in DUIM using the DUIM-OLE-Control library. It assumes that you have already read about implementing OLE compound document servers in Section 3.4 on page 139.
